name: Cosmic Race (itch)
description:
Welcome, traveller, to a journey through the cosmos! Pick a ship to start!

This game was created for the Core Dev Bootcamp application (theme: Space & Time).  Game is in development with more features to come.  Built with Core.

Community Content Credits: Nuclear (discord), Manticore Team, MrDrRobotoMan, Drogan, Keppu, Blackajack, gortz, hayes, elliotfiske, standardcombo, randomphantom, Antropy

Special Thanks: Aggripina for the encouragement, EmilRieux for holding down the fort while I pursue my passion, BlueClairey & TheBronzeSword for playtesting

Thank you for stopping by!
